channel.title: How to tweak whonix-ws-15 for more privacy?
channel.description:
Hi,
i want to make a few modifications to whonix-ws-15, so all my dispVM's will use them.
1. Set the security level to "Safest" 2. Set the standard search to the onion version of Duckduckgo
I found these ressources. [Here](http://forums.dds6qkxpwdeubwucdiaord2xgbbeyds25rbsgr73tbfpqpt4a6vjwsyd.onion/t/how-do-i-customise-tor-browser-in-a-whonix-templatebased-dvm-in-whonix-14/5580/2?u=merboros) for general modification and [here](https://evervee.me/how/duckduckgo-onion-default-search-tor/)(clearweb) for the .onion search.
The first link is for whonix-ws-14 and the proposed solution is not working for me, as the new dispVM's dont use my modifications.
The second link looks kinda new, but is deprecated, and i never did something like it.
So on both topics, i could use a hint where to search for a solution.
merboros
